formal_name: A Little Bit of... All Time Classics™: Card Classics
description:
Enjoy some of the world’s favourite games together in one handy collection, playable with Touch Screen controls, and with support for up to eight players.

A Little Bit of... All Time Classics: Card Classics features five best-loved card games: Blackjack, Last Card, Last Card Plus, President and Five Card Draw.

Play solo against computer opponents, learn the rules with in-depth instructions, or play with friends wirelessly, sharing a single copy of the game. You can even send a game to a friend’s Nintendo DS or Nintendo DSi as a gift, which they can enjoy until they turn off their system!
name: A Little Bit of... All Time Classics™: Card Classics
